name: Rogue Company: Season Two Starter Pack
name_original: Rogue Company: Season Two Starter Pack
description:
Gear up for the new Season of Rogue Company with the Season Two Starter Pack. Equip the cutting-edge new Future Medic Saint Outfit and Yellow Jacket Primary Weapon Wrap to strike fear into your opponents every time they fall into your crosshairs. Includes 600 Rogue Bucks so you can round out your look in the in-game store with emotes, sprays, outfits, wraps, profile customization, and more.

This Pack Contains: - 600 Rogue Bucks - Future Medic Saint Outfit - Yellow Jacket Primary Weapon Wrap
